name: Xtreme Xcape
description:
This another game remake from the T.V. show Regular Show. This one is from the "Bet To Be Blonde Episode", and I tried my best to recreate it. Use w, a or right arrow and left arrow to move. Use e or right shift to shoot. Use w or up arrow to use doors. Use s or down arrow to go down stairs. I hope you enjoy my remake!

If you're having trouble downloading the app, download the itch.io app and install and launch from there.
